info.name: Dark Fiverr by CptBrian (2022+)
info.description: A fantastic dark theme baseline, but don't expect this style to perfectly cover everything, because there's tons to tackle. I've put in 40+ hours of work supporting most of Fiverr, but some of the order/messaging stuff I can't feasibly do as I don't currently engage with those services. CSS Code (reformatted) & Updates below! My PayPal for donations if you are so kind: CptBrian@Outlook.com (much appreciated!)
info.additionalInfo: • 1.1 — May 5, 2022: → Added support for the "Out of Office" notice box. • 1.0 — April 27, 2022: → Uploaded with over 1,150 lines of CSS (not splitting multi-selector conditions into new lines) → Supports most of the site at this point, but definitely not all of it. This is a really great start, though Fiverr is likely going to change over time and break this style down bit by bit. → The first CSS override available for Fiverr with a significant amount of work done.
